ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Ssra Temple
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, I gave some serious consideration to memming our Divine Aura song (Kazumi s Protection sp?) and having the group train to the zone out. Then inviting
ygData.messageBody:
Actually, I gave some serious consideration to memming
our Divine Aura song (Kazumi's Protection sp?) and
having the group train to the zone out. Then inviting
another 5 and doing it again until we all got out.
The 3 minute recycle time is sweet. I use it to train
the Temple in PoH and drag 10 or 12 Amy's around while
they tag off the end. Sometimes it recycles while I
am still leading the mobs in circles ;)

Sylly


--- Christopher Sanders
<christopher.sanders@...> wrote:
> Luckily, Sylly, with uber bardic melee and mad song
> skillz, promptly cleared
> all mobs, and then using Melanies Melliflous Motion,
> got everyone in her
> guild safely to the zone line!
>
> zzZZZZzzzz...***
>
> Oh, sorry...I'm awake now. Strange dream...I dreamt
> that bards were
> somewhat powerful. :P hehe...j/k...it's friday!
> :)
>
> Atonal
